akn:section.akn:heading: Leases: non-excess property of military departments and Defense Agencies

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Whenever the Secretary concerned considers it advantageous to the United States, the Secretary concerned may lease to such lessee and upon such terms as the Secretary concerned considers will promote the national defense or to be in the public interest, real or personal property that—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Community Support Facilities and Community Support Services Under Lease; Waiver.—
Treatment of Lessee Interest in Property.—

akn:content.akn:p: (f) The interest of a lessee of property leased under this section may be taxed by State or local governments. A lease under this section shall provide that, if and to the extent that the leased property is later made taxable by State or local governments under an Act of Congress, the lease shall be renegotiated.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Special Rules for Base Closure and Realignment Property.—
Competitive Procedures for Selection of Certain Lessees; Exception.—

akn:content.akn:p: (j) This section does not apply to oil, mineral, or phosphate lands.
